GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v6.0.12
GSD.description:
iommu/vt-d: Fix PCI device refcount leak in has_external_pci()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.12 by commit 17f67414718e6aba123335a33b7d15aa594fff34, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 89a6079df791aeace2044ea93be1b397195824ec. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iommu/vt-d: Fix PCI device refcount leak in has_external_pci()
